channel.title: CVE Feed for Resort Data Processing, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-39420|2023-09-07T12:17:09.872Z -- resort%20data%20processing%2C%20inc. -- irm%20next%20generation
item.description: The RDPCore.dll component as used in the IRM Next Generation booking engine, allows a remote user to connect to customers with an "admin" account and a corresponding password computed daily by a routine inside the DLL file. Once reverse-engineered, this routine can help an attacker generate the daily password and connect to application customers. Given that this is an administrative account, anyone logging into a customer deployment has full, unrestricted access to the application.
